issue.title: [R] Refactor repeated code into check_match function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15507](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15507). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12277#discussion_r794636116 we discuss similar reasoning in two different places in the codebase; this should be refactored into a function to make the code easier to skim.
